content: one stitch knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over knit stitch to decrease by one stitch kfb = knit into front then into back of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch baby rhino page 4 baby rhino page 5 head beginning at the front of rhino s nose with yarn a cast on 16 sts row 1 increase k6 kfb 4 times k6 to end - 20sts row 2 purl row 3 decrease k5 skpo k6 k2tog k5 to end - 18sts row 4 purl row 5 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 20sts row 6 purl work short row to create nose shaping as follows short row 1 k12 w+tk wrap and turn knit see page 3 short row 2 p4 w+tp wrap and turn purl short row 3 k3 w+tk short row 4 p2 w+tp short row 5 k4 w+tk it looks wrong but this is correct short row 6 p6 w+tp it looks wrong but this is correct short row 7 k13 to the end of the row add horn space row 7 purl 10 turn flip work over so that knit-side faces you continue to work on rhino s right side as follows row 8 k10 row 9 increase pfb p9 turn note these are not w+t row - 11 right side sts row 10 k11 row 11 p11 cut yarn slip all 11 right side sts onto a safety pin baby rhino page 6 baby rhino page 7 left side horn continued ws facing rejoin yarn a to 10 sts for rhino s left side row 1 decrease p2tog p5 p2tog - 7sts row 7 purl 10 sts to end of row row 2 knit continue to work on rhino s left side as follows row 3 decrease p2tog p3 p2tog - 5sts row 8 k10 turn flip work over so that purl-side faces you row 4 knit row 9 increase p9 pfb - 11 left side sts row 5 decrease p2tog p1 p2tog - 3sts row 10 k11 row 6 decrease k3tog fasten_off for horn point see fig 3 row 11 p11 cut yarn slip all 11 left side sts onto a safety pin a b horn rs facing begin at the corner of rhino s left side sts that are held on the safety pin working along the row ends at horn space with yarn a pick up and knit 9 stitches to the corner of the right side sts that are held on the cast on edge safety pin see fig 1 pick up as dotted line shows from a to b fig 2 shows the picked-up and knitted stitches fig 2 horn space b a b a rhino s left side cast on edge cast on edge fig 3 fig 1 baby rhino page 8 baby rhino page 9 forehead short row 5 k11 w+tk rs and cast-on edge facing you slip rhino
